definitions: the tendency to attract attention because of one's exuberance, confidence, and stylishness

examples.text: he had a reputation for flair and flamboyance
critics dismiss his flamboyance and excess as indulgent

shortDefinitions: tendency to attract attention because of one's exuberance and stylishness

definitions: the quality of being bright, colorful, and very noticeable

examples.text: the stunning tones give the show a lot of visual flamboyance

shortDefinitions: quality of being bright, colourful, and very noticeable
